short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will kill ads on popular websites with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Websites with an enormous amount of ads on them will kill your phone or Wi-Fi data real quick. This chrome extension will help eliminate ad heavy traffic from popular websites.
